description: Episode of Series "Drugs: the children are choosing". The third film in the series presents a systematic discussion of drugs and their effects. Examines all classes of drugs, then urges that drug abuse education focus on the dangers of alcohol and cigarettes with an emphasis equal to that placed on other drugs. With Dr James Fadiman.
